Name: Lede
Civic Center: Civic Center is the heart of New York City government. Big decisions are debated in its big buildings, and well-dressed people with briefcases rush to and fro. Centrally located and teeming with important-looking marble staircases, Civic Center is one of the citys most easily accessible neighborhoodsits served by 15 subway lines! This neighborhood means business, so dont expect to find a thriving shopping district or nightlife options here.

Name: Intro
Civic Center: Civic Center's marble buildings and stately architecture are the face of New York City government.

Name: Photo_Captions
Civic Center: ["The daytime brings purpose-driven professionals and hurried footsteps to the halls and corridors of Civic Center's marble buildings.", "New York City is filled with astounding architecture. Civic Center's prominent buildings and stately halls put on a fine display of grandeur."]
